title: Matt
description: A Paranormal Werebear M/M Bear Shifter Romance  This is a standalone of about 150 pages with a Happily Ever After ending and No cliffhanger. This book also contains several additional bonus stories to enjoy!  Matt has known since puberty that the promise of finding a mate that drove other shifters wasn’t for him. Matt is different. Nature doesn’t provide mates for freaks like him. When Cannon enters his life, his carefully constructed world begins to crumble. Cannon threatens to throw Matt’s entire life and career into jeopardy. But damned if he can stay away from the sexy shifter who is determined to claim him.  NOTE This is the final book in the series centered around the southwestern town of Burden, Texas, where livin’ is easy, beer flows freely, and pretty women are abundant. The last thing the good ol’ bears of Burden are thinking about is finding a mate or settling down. But, fate has its own plan…  WARNING: THIS BOOK CONTAINS GRAPHIC SCENES OF A SEXUAL NATURE AND IS NOT INTENDED FOR READERS UNDER 18.  Bears of Burden: MATT is an adult bear shifter romance that will appeal to lovers of M/M paranormal, urban fantasy, shapeshifters, contemporary, and, of course, spicy, sizzling, hot gay romance.
author: Candace Ayers
